choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews
Okay, here is your meal plan for the next week without dairy, milk based yogurts, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butters or cashew nuts. Breakfast: Day 1 - Oatmeal with berries and walnuts; Day 2 - Vegan avocado toast with tomatoes and chia seeds; Day 3 - Fruit smoothie made of bananas, strawberries and almond milk; Day 4 - Quinoa porridge with apples and pumpkin seeds. Lunch: Day 1 - Chickpeas and spinach salad with lemon dressing; Day 2 - Vegan tacos filled with black beans, corn and salsa; Day 3 - Tofu sandwiches made of tofu, lettuce and tomato; Day 4 - Lentil soup. Dinner: Day 1 - Baked chicken thighs with roasted potatoes and carrots; Day 2 - Vegan bolognese pasta made from lentils and mushrooms; Day 3 - Roast beef with steamed vegetables and gravy; Day 4 - Grilled salmon with lemon, herbs and new potatoes. Snacks: Day 1 - Fruit platter with berries and pineapple chunks; Day 2 - Vegan energy balls made of oats and peanut butter; Day 3 - Roasted vegetables and hummus dip; Day 4 - Frozen yogurt made from soy milk.
